Package Appointment

Class AppointmentOutcomeManager

Object
AppointmentOutcomeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentOutcomeService
public class AppointmentOutcomeManager extends Object implements AppointmentOutcomeService
The AppointmentOutcomeManager class manages appointment outcomes, including recording, updating, and viewing outcomes. It interacts with DataProcessor for data persistence in CSV files and supports functionality for both doctors and patients.

This class implements the AppointmentOutcomeService interface to ensure consistency in managing appointment outcomes.

Common variables between appointment and outcome records include patient ID and appointment date. Each recorded outcome is linked to an appointment and tracked using unique identifiers.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Xing Juan Rennie

  • Method Details

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome(String typeOfService, String prescribedMedication, String prescribedMedicationQuantity, String prescriptionStatus, String consultationNotes, String appointmentID)
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including prescribed medication, consultation notes, and prescription status. Updates the appointment status to "Completed" and creates a corresponding outcome record.
      Specified by:
      recordAppointmentOutcome in interface AppointmentOutcomeService
      Parameters:
      typeOfService - the type of service provided during the appointment
      prescribedMedication - the medication prescribed to the patient
      prescribedMedicationQuantity - the quantity of medication prescribed
      prescriptionStatus - the status of the prescription (e.g., filled, pending)
      consultationNotes - notes recorded during the consultation
      appointmentID - the unique identifier of the appointment

    • viewPastRecords

      public void viewPastRecords(String patientID)
      Allows a patient to view all past appointment outcomes using their patient ID.
      Specified by:
      viewPastRecords in interface AppointmentOutcomeService
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier of the patient whose records are to be viewed

    • viewOutcomeRecord

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      appointmentOutcomeID - the unique identifier of the appointment outcome record
